tool_description: Creates and manages authenticated customer support sessions based on successful identity verification.

verification_methods.description: List of successful verification methods used

permission_level.description: Session permission level: basic, standard, or elevated

error_messages: Invalid session duration: Must be between 5 and 480 minutes.
Invalid permission level: Use basic, standard, or elevated.
Account not found: Invalid account_id provided.
Invalid verification methods: At least one valid verification method required.
Agent not found: Invalid agent_id provided.
Session limit exceeded: Customer already has maximum active sessions.
usage: Provide account_id, verification_methods array, and agent_id. Optionally set session_duration_minutes and permission_level based on verification strength.

permission_level.description: Granted permission level for this session

allowed_operations.description: List of operations permitted in this session
